attributes.action: halt the implementation of the "Vetting and Barring Scheme"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is considerable public disquiet about the "Vetting and Barring Scheme". It will require all adults who regularly drive children to sports and social events to apply to pass vetting criteria.

There are various objections to this measure but this petition exists for all who are opposed to it for whatever reason.

We wish this measure to not be implemented.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
